data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of the Neotropical genus Cremastosperma (Annonaceae), including five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pirie, Michael D., Chatrou, Lars W., Maas, Paul J. M. (2018): A taxonomic revision of the Neotropical genus Cremastosperma (Annonaceae), including five new species. PhytoKeys 112: 1-141, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.112.24897, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.112.24897
